ygData.subject: Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, Sereph said something about Clerics. There are somethings special about Clerics.... a)They tank b)They stand back and heal Its useless to have a Troll
ygData.messageBody:
Well, Sereph said something about Clerics.

There are somethings special about Clerics....
a)They tank
b)They stand back and heal

Its useless to have a Troll Cleric <<RPG sake>> but he tanks. Rather have a Gnome/Human Cleric that stands back and heal. I've had many bad experiences like you guys where your Dear Cleric is trying to tank those Dervs/Crocos. That is complete crap. But of course, you have got to let him take a few go at the monsters if not SI BEI SIAN!

My 2 cents...
